Start-Text: Switzerland is the cable car country par excellence. <a Href=""http://www.bak.admin.ch/kulturerbe/04273/04296/index.html?lang=de""> The Federal Office of Culture </ a> as a specialized body records the historic preservation values ​​of the cable cars in Switzerland <a href=""http://www.seilbahninventar.ch""> Swiss cable car inventory </ a>.The portfolio of regulated federal and cantonal <a href=""http://map.geo.admin.ch/?layers=ch.swisstopo.vec25-uebrigerverkehr""> cable cars </ a> includes approximately 3000 objects. Out of them, 129 were included in the inventory due to their special cultural, historical and / or technical significance. Do you recognize the cable cars and can you position them on the map?
